subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The sophomore Ray Rice and the fifth-year senior Brian Leonard are the sizzle and soul of the Rutgers Scarlet Knights’ crushing ground game, which is the nation’s eighth best.
snippet: The sophomore Ray Rice and the fifth-year senior Brian Leonard are the sizzle and soul of the Rutgers Scarlet Knights’ crushing ground game, which is the nation’s eighth best.
